group_1.narration: Even though we did take it down,@that Uwasa thing was an@unbelievably tough enemy to beat,@even with three people giving it their all.
And there's even more of them out there...
This Kamihama place is completely insane.@A city beyond rhyme or reason.

group_1.textLeft: Hey, before you go, could I ask you for@a little favor?

group_1.textRight: What do ya want?

group_1.textLeft: If you see Mami, could you maybe try@to smooth over our misunderstanding?

group_1.textRight: Oh, you mean about your [textRed:Doppel]?
I dunno when I'll see Mami next.
But hey, if I do run into her, I'll tell her@she was just overthinkin' things.
On your way home?

group_1.textLeft: Kyoko? What are you doing here?

group_1.textRight: Nothin' much. Doin' the same as you. Headin'@home.
Oh yeah... Since we're both here, there's@somethin' I wanted to tell ya.
Remember that Humanoid Witch you told me@about not too long ago?
That wasn't a Witch. Just somethin' that@comes out when your Soul Gem gets tainted.
They said it's like some kinda "projection of@your feelings".
Anyway, it's not a Witch. That's all I wanted@to tell ya.
Later.

group_1.textLeft: Wait! Where did you hear that?

group_1.textRight: I didn't hear it anywhere, I saw it myself.

group_1.textLeft: You did?! You went to Kamihama?!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, I did.

group_1.textLeft: Why?! I made it really clear that you @shouldn't get involved!

group_1.textRight: Huh? Ya thought I'd really just do what you@told me to?
A warnin' is a warnin'. Thanks for the@heads-up.
But what I do with that info...
Is completely up to me, all right?

group_1.textLeft: I can't just watch you throw yourself into@danger and put yourself at risk.
You should consider yourself lucky you made@it back. From now onâ€”

group_1.textRight: What? Are you seriously about to lecture me@on what to do again?
What's your deal? You wanna keep me@all wrapped up on a tight leash, is that it?

group_1.textLeft: If there's a way to protect you, I will do@everything I can...
I don't know what you think of me...
But for me...if even for just a moment...
You were my friend, who went through@all the same highs and lows as I did.

group_1.textCenter: I can't give up on Mifuyu.
We experienced 7 years of Magical Girl @life together, good and bad, as friends...

group_1.narration: Because you fought beside her?@Because you knew her a long time?@Because she's your friend?@Because you're family...
None of that matters.@It doesn't mean anythin' to me...
People change.@A person's heart is so fragile.@Even if one piece falls out @of place it will easily break.

group_1.textRight: I've changed...
I'm not the same person I was back then.
I'm not drunk on some idiotic idea of@justice...
Eager to protect everyone and keep 'em@happy...
I'm not your naive little Magical@Girl underlin' anymore!
And you still say...
You wanna "protect" me?
What a joke...

group_1.textCenter: Yes, I do feel that way.
I hope that someday we can share the@same view...the same path, again...
There is just no way that I can give up@on you.
